data.text: #UN agencies launch USD$193million appeal to help over 96k Syrian #refugees in Iraq, Jordan, Lebanon and Turkey: http://t.co/qun5TiER
Happening now at the General Assembly: Countries gather to discuss Global #Counterterrorism strategy. Watch live: http://t.co/tlOXIxLM
Is your country taking part of the #greeneconomy? Take a look at this @UNEP interactive map and find out! http://t.co/btT1hiOC
Number of Palestinians affected by Israeli demolitions has increased 87% says #humanrights expert: http://t.co/gMHMz9UH via @UNRightsWire
Delivering food aid can be an extremely risky job, like this@WFP photo from #Afghanistan shows: http://t.co/nUc4CF8s
UN-Arab League Envoy @KofiAnnan says Action Group for #Syria to meet on Saturday http://t.co/rfY7RIPx
Victim of terrorism Max Boon shares his experiences at UN symposium on #Counterterrorism. Video: http://t.co/CyTjL4LZ
Sites in Pakistan & the Philippines have been removed from @UNESCO list of #WorldHeritage in Danger: http://t.co/J5UOlMQt
NGOs & civil society can register their interest to participate in the GA High-level Meeting on #ruleoflaw by July 9: http://t.co/HMxMfvFf
Why are countries gathering on July 2 to discuss #armstradetreaty? Learn more on the @ATT_Conference: http://t.co/XYdEVuFA
Wednesday at UNHQ: General Assembly President hosts special event on counterterrorism. Watch live:  http://t.co/dYIvFCVQ
How is @WFPlogistics delivering aid to those who need in the #Sahel? See this interactive map: http://t.co/SH9dBaFt
Change the world with #ICT! Enter the @ITU_News Young #Innovators Competition. Details here: http://t.co/PK5NlYB0
Actress Geena Davis touts the work of @ITU_News in a recent interview. Watch: http://t.co/YdnaiGXi
Ban Ki-moon: Changing patterns of drug consumption jeopardize gains in sustainable development and good governance. http://t.co/nlpijOUW
New strategy regarding the Lord's Resistance Army (#LRA) is presented by UN and AU: http://t.co/xIwQ0T5o
Intl Day in Support of Victims of Torture: States must provide victims w/ compensation and rehabilitation - Ban. http://t.co/0wFCEKJE
Tuesday at UNHQ:  General Assembly debate on Drugs and Crime as a Threat to Development." Watch live: http://t.co/dYIvFCVQ
Over 18 million people still face food insecurity in the #Sahel. Latest update in ths @UNOCHA infographic: http://t.co/9Z1fvR52
47,000 women are estimated to die as a result of unsafe abortions every year. Updated info from @WHO: http://t.co/b7bsZiNC
Tuesday is the International Day in Support of Victims of Torture. More here: http://t.co/eETauNlX
Video: See how kids at a refugee camp in #Mauritania used @WFP cameras to give you a glimpse of their world http://t.co/Lr5FTCub #sahel
Tuesday is the Intl Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking. Details here: http://t.co/taWj6lgo. Follow @UNODC all year for updates.
The Global #Counterterrorism strategy will be reviewed at the General Assembly on June 28 & 29. More info: http://t.co/DB8Hgp27
Monday is Intl Day of the Seafarer, see: http://t.co/ntXuKvNq & follow @IMOHQ all year for maritime updates #thankyouseafarer
Happening now: Security Council Open Debate on the Protection of #Civilians in Armed Conflict. Watch here: http://t.co/uNkhHDfB
Monday at UNHQ: Public Service Day Awards ceremony. Watch live: http://t.co/dYIvFCVQ. Full list of winners: http://t.co/Urmg92Rn
Intl Day of the Seafarer -- seafarers ensure that what you need arrives safely. More here: http://t.co/ntXuKvNq #thankyouseafarer
Continues this week in Geneva: #HumanRights Council holds 20th regular session  http://t.co/VGbpC4Zz -- follow #HRC20 & @UN_HRC
Tunisia: see how #refugee children celebrated World @Refugees Day last week: http://t.co/NP17eZf4 Photo via @Rocconuri
After #Rioplus20, what role will #socialmedia play in the #FutureWeWant? See what @Mashable's Pete Cashmore said: http://t.co/DpItL5FW
Monday is Intl Day of the Seafarer. See how these workers affect your life & say #thankyouseafarer. Video: http://t.co/9Qj4OEpB
Over US$50k were raised by @FriendsUNRWA for projects in Gaza. Meet those who made it possible: http://t.co/H8YrQuiO (corrected)
Obrigado to all the Brazilian staff & volunteers who made #RioPlus20 run smoothly. See some of their work here: http://t.co/Jar4RK6D
The Human Rights Council continues its 20th session this week. More about their work in this @UN_HRC video: http://t.co/J4ECKil8
Report launched this week says #humanrights treaty body system in urgent need of help http://t.co/OWxsWyOV
This week at #Rioplus20, Ban Ki-moon outlined three sustainable #energy4all goals for 2030 http://t.co/KSTqOjZu #futurewewant
Find out how #FutureWeWant exhibit at #Rioplus20 visualized sustainability solutions for 2030. Details & photos: http://t.co/m2Vtuu2p
Starts this week in St Petersburg: 36th Session of @UNESCO World Heritage Committee: http://t.co/XLpDfVmS
As attendees head home from #RioPlus20, postcards & letters w/special stamps are making their way around the world: http://t.co/EwGbficT
Video from Somalia: displaced Somalis get new homes that change their lives. http://t.co/yyccPC6d via @UNOCHA
#RioPlus20 Reads post: @TheElders chair Desmond Tutu on the #FutureWeWant: "I want a world run by women" http://t.co/kWugZofJ #EplusY

@felimmcmahon Yes, you can use our photos. Specific credits are in the caption for most pics on our account.

Now that #Rioplus20 has ended, see what participants say about their experiences in Rio & the #FutureWeWant http://t.co/x847FCCc
World #Refugee Day was this week. This video explains that 2011 was year w/highest number of @Refugees this century. http://t.co/qKWczbZE
The #FutureWeWant was on display all over at #RioPlus20. Here's one example -- a special music performance: http://t.co/9sB62w2d

@ActionCounts Thank you! Looking forward to continued cooperation.
